sentence.Network_en: Having arrived unannounced for supper, we had to take potluck.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于没有提前通知我们要来吃晚饭, 我们只能吃些家常便饭.

sentence.Network_en: The scheduled flight was canceled and passengers had to take potluck on the other airlines.
sentence.Network_cn: 原定航班被取消了,乘客们只能在其他航线上试试运气.
